**Hello!** Welcome to my *Level* of the internet!

I am a graduate student studying Public Administration at Ohio University with an expected graduation of May 2024. I am also a health data analytics and visualization enthusiast looking for an opportunity to continue my learning journey with R.

Outside of the classroom and my RStudio panel I take adult learn to skate lessons, own a precious but patience-testing grey tabby named Pesto, spend my summers sailing on the Great Lakes, and love to cross stitch!

Check out my CV below and example work in my [Past Projects](myprojects.qmd) and [Blog](blog.qmd)!
